= Introduction =

This is the Main Page. Before you can start working, you need to set up a POL 099 environment. Just PM Agata in the WoD forum for instructions on how to set this up.

Make sure you are using the Stygian Abyss Classic Client available here: 
http://games.on.net/file/36130/Ultima_Online_Stygian_Abyss_-_Classic_Client_v7.0.7.1
